attributes.action: Abolish First Class areas on Southern trains.
attributes.background: Thousands of people commute across the UK, including to and from London using Southern trains. Their services are delayed, overcrowded and they STILL have 1st class seats that are identical to the rest preventing more people from having a seat!  Please, let's end this now!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as this is a matter for Southern. You could contact them directly with your suggestion:

http://www.southernrailway.com/p/contact-us/
